            var plataformaEspecificada = '';
            if(!plataformaEspecificada) {
                var topDownloads = new TopDownloads();
                topDownloads.init({
                    'categoria': ''
                });
            }
        });
    </script><script>
        $(function() {
            var techtudoNanoScrollerTopDownloads = new TechtudoNanoScrollerTopDowloads();
            techtudoNanoScrollerTopDownloads.init({
                'className': '.gui-card#card-top-downloads .gui-card-content',
                'mobileGroup': 'desktop'
            });
        });

                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();glb.barra={itemCustomizado:{cor:"#666666",texto:"tecnologia",url:"http://www.techtudo.com.br/"}};</script></body>

<li class="r7-newicons r7-youtube" title="Inscreva-se no canal do R7 no Youtube">
<a rel="nofollow" href="https://youtube.com/r7" target="_blank">Inscreva-se no canal do R7 no Youtube</a>
</li>
<li class="r7-newicons r7-rss" title="Receba notícias do R7">
<a rel="nofollow" href="http://www.r7.com/institucional/rss/rss.html" target="_blank">Receba notícias do R7</a>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</li>
</ul>
<div class="header-menu-horizontal-send-video">
<a href="http://tv.r7.com/envie-seu-video" title="Envie um vídeo para o R7">

</a>

<script id="articles-template" type="text/x-handlebars-template">
          {{#each articles}}            

            <li id="nativeads_position_{{@index}}" class="{{#not_empty cover_image_url}}nwl-has-img{{/not_empty}} nwl-row {{#if showDate}}new-date{{/if}}">     

              {{#if showDate}}
                <h6 class="nwl-date"> {{dateFormat first_published_at}} </h6>
              {{/if}}
              <div class="clearfix"></div>
              <div class="wrap-li">
                <span class="nwl-news-time">{{timeFormat first_published_at}}</span>

                {{#not_empty cover_image_url}}
                <span data-href="{{url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" class="nwl-wpr-cover box">
                  <div class="r7-shareit-holder">                      
                      <div class="image-holder" style="position: relative">
                      <img alt="" class="article-video-icon-tag" style="{{#not_empty is_video}}display: block{{/not_empty}}" src="data:image/png;base64," />

                        <a href="{{url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" data-social-headline="{{section_name}}"  data-social-lead="{{treatment_title title}}" data-shorten="{{url}}" target="{{is_r7_domain url}}">
                            <img class="nwl-cover-reference" src="{{treatment_image cover_image_url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" width="180" height="95" />
                        </a>
                            <div class="r7-shareit-bar no-text">
        <ul class="r7-shareit small">
          <li data-social-type="facebook" title="Compartilhe no Facebook" class="r7-icons r7-facebook shareit"></li>
          <li data-social-type="twitter" title="Compartilhe no Twitter" class="r7-icons r7-twitter shareit"></li>

        </ul>
    </div>

                      </div>                      
                  </div>
                </span>
                {{/not_empty}}

                  <div class="r7-shareit-holder">

                      <a data-social-headline="{{section_name}}"  data-social-lead="{{treatment_title title}}" data-shorten="{{url}}" href="{{url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" class="nwl-link" target="{{is_r7_domain url}}">
                        {{treatment_title title}}
                      </a>
                      <img class="hidden" src="{{cover_image_url}}" />

<div id="share_box">
<a title="Fechar" class="fechar" href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="modal.remove();">X</a>
<h5>Enviar por e-mail</h5>
<form method="post" action="/r7/service/sendtofriend/sendToFriend.jsp" target="sendtofriend" onsubmit="validaCampos(this, event)">
<fieldset>
<div class="desc obs">(todos os campos marcados com * são obrigatórios)</div>
<div style="display:none;" class="link"><label for="espalhelink">Link para esta página</label><input type="text" name="espalhelink" id="espalhelink"></div>
<div id="espalhe_alerta" style="display: none;"></div>
<div class="alerta">
<span class="iconAlert"></span> Preencha os campos corretamente.
</div>
<div class="sucesso">
<span class="iconOk"></span> Mensagem enviada com sucesso!
</div>
<div class="campo">
<label for="seunome">*Seu nome</label>
<input type="text" onblur="campoObrig(this)" onfocus="campoTextFoco(this)" title="até 120 caracteres" value="até 120 caracteres" maxlength="120" class="required text" id="seunome" name="seunome">
</div>
<div class="campo">
<label for="seuemail">*Seu e-mail</label>
<input type="text" onblur="campoObrig(this)" onfocus="campoTextFoco(this)" title="até 120 caracteres" value="até 120 caracteres" maxlength="120" class="required email" id="seuemail" name="seuemail">
</div>
<div class="campo">
<label for="nomeamigo">*Nome do amigo</label>
<input type="text" onblur="campoObrig(this)" onfocus="campoTextFoco(this)" title="até 120 caracteres" value="até 120 caracteres" maxlength="120" class="required text" id="nomeamigo" name="nomeamigo">
</div>
<div class="campo">
<label for="emailamigo">*E-mail do amigo</label>
<input type="text" onblur="campoObrig(this)" onfocus="campoTextFoco(this)" title="até 120 caracteres" value="até 120 caracteres" maxlength="120" class="required email" id="emailamigo" name="emailamigo">
</div>
<input id="newslink" type="hidden" name="newslink" value="http://noticias.r7.com/">
<input id="newstitle" type="hidden" name="newstitle" value=" - R7">
<div class="campo right">
<input title="Enviar" class="botao" type="submit" value="Enviar">
</div>
</fieldset>
</form>
<pagespeed_iframe style="display:none;" src="https://scs.r7.com/img/pix.gif" name="sendtofriend"><script pagespeed_orig_type="text/javascript" type="text/psajs" orig_index="35">
pagespeed.deferIframe.convertToIframe();</script></pagespeed_iframe>
</div>
<div id="report_error_box" class="hidden">
<a title="Fechar" class="fechar" href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="modal.remove()">X</a>
<h5>Comunicar Erro</h5>
<form action="/r7/service/contactus/addContactUsSimple.jsp" onsubmit="validaCampos(this, event)" target="postcontactus" method="post" name="form_contactus">
<fieldset>
<div class="desc">Preencha os campos abaixo para informar o R7 sobre os erros encontrados nas nossas reportagens.</div>
<div id="msg-callback">
<div id="successMessage" class="sucesso">
<span class="iconOk"></span>
Mensagem enviada com Sucesso!
</div>
<div id="errorMessage">
<span class="iconAlert"></span>
Erro ao enviar mensagem, tente novamente!
</div>
</div>
<div class="campo">
<label for="report_name">*Seu nome: </label>
<input type="text" onblur="campoObrig(this)" onfocus="campoTextFoco(this)" title="até 120 caracteres" value="até 120 caracteres" maxlength="120" class="required text" id="report_name" name="nome"/>
<span></span>
</div>
<div class="campo">
<label for="report_email">*Seu e-mail: </label>
<input type="text" onblur="campoObrig(this)" onfocus="campoTextFoco(this)" title="até 120 caracteres" value="até 120 caracteres" maxlength="120" class="required email" id="report_email" name="email" class="text"/>
<span></span>
</div>
<div class="campo">
<label for="report_message">*Comentários: </label>
<textarea onblur="campoObrig(this)" onfocus="campoTextFoco(this)" title="digite aqui sua mensagem" rows="3" cols="5" id="report_message" name="mensagem" class="required text">digite aqui sua mensagem</textarea>
<span></span>
</div>
<input type="hidden" value="http://noticias.r7.com/" id="urlErro" name="link"/>
<input type="hidden" value="true" name="customEmail"/>
<input type="hidden" value="8A488A52236838B8012368418C850D04" name="serviceInstanceId" id="contactUs_serviceInstanceId"/>
<input type="hidden" value="2C92948B23F743400123F83A89463582" name="assunto"/>
<div class="campo">
<a class="falecomr7" title="Fale com o R7" target="_blank" href="http://www.r7.com/institucional/fale-com-o-r7/fale-com-o-r7.html">Para resolver dúvidas ou tratar de outros assuntos, entre em contato usando o <span>Fale Com o R7</span></a>
